name: The Royal Game of Ur
description: The Royal Game of Ur is an ancient racing game where players try to get all of their tokens across the board first. 3000 years ago this was one of the most popular board games in the world. Play it yourself to find out why!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 150 MB available space Sound Card: Not required
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 8 GB RAM Storage: 150 MB available space
